price: Waɗannan akwai albarku a kansu daga Ubangijinsu da wata rahama. Kuma waɗannan sũ ne shiryayyu.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ صَلَوَٰتٞ مِّن رَّبِّهِمۡ وَرَحۡمَةٞۖ وَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡمُهۡتَدُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: ulāika ʿalayhim ṣalawātun min rabbihim waraḥmatun wa-ulāika humu al-muh'tadūna
